oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: At Ease - 1940-02-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM's At Ease radio program, originally broadcast 1940-02-21. Featuring Jane Grant (singer), the Soothenaires (orchestra), and Ott Devine (announcer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jane Grant; Soothenaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Opening statement -- The Blue Room / Charmaine (medley) -- Speaking Of Heaven (Jane Grant vocals) -- Sunny Spain -- It Isn't Fair (Jane Grant vocals)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); At Ease (Radio program); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Soothenaires (Musical group); Grant, Jane (Singer)
